languages.text: "Едва ли есть протокол на случай такого кризиса, но... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}В ваших словах{/d} звучит Лекс Империалис". {n}Женщина хмурится, но подозрительность в ее взгляде тает.{/n}

"I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Едва ли есть протокол на случай такого кризиса, но... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}В ваших словах{/d} звучит Лекс Империалис". {n}Женщина хмурится, но подозрительность в ее взгляде тает.{/n}

"I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

languages.text: “恐怕没有应对这种危机的协议，不过……我在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}你的质问{/d}中听到了帝国律法的声音。”{n}她皱起了眉头，但目光中的怀疑之色减轻了些。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “恐怕没有应对这种危机的协议，不过……我在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}你的质问{/d}中听到了帝国律法的声音。”{n}她皱起了眉头，但目光中的怀疑之色减轻了些。{/n}

languages.text: 「このような危機に対するプロトコルが存在するかは甚だ疑問ですが…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの言葉{/d}からレックス・インペリアの声が聞こえます」{n}彼女は眉をひそめるが、その視線に宿っていた疑念はいくらか和らいでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「このような危機に対するプロトコルが存在するかは甚だ疑問ですが…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたの言葉{/d}からレックス・インペリアの声が聞こえます」{n}彼女は眉をひそめるが、その視線に宿っていた疑念はいくらか和らいでいる。{/n}

languages.text: «Dudo que exista un protocolo para una crisis como esta, pero... oigo la voz de la Lex Imperialis en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sus palabras{/d}». {n}Frunce el ceño, pero la suspicacia de su mirada se ha reducido parcialmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que exista un protocolo para una crisis como esta, pero... oigo la voz de la Lex Imperialis en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}sus palabras{/d}». {n}Frunce el ceño, pero la suspicacia de su mirada se ha reducido parcialmente.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, dass es für eine Krise wie diese ein Protokoll gibt, aber ... ich höre die Stimme des Lex Imperia in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Euren Worten{/d}." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht, aber das Misstrauen in ihrem Blick hat sich ein wenig gelegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, dass es für eine Krise wie diese ein Protokoll gibt, aber ... ich höre die Stimme des Lex Imperia in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Euren Worten{/d}." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht, aber das Misstrauen in ihrem Blick hat sich ein wenig gelegt.{/n}

languages.text: "Böyle bir kriz için bir protokol olduğunu pek sanmam ama… {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Sözlerinizde{/d} Lex İmperialis'in sesini duyuyorum." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor, yine de bakışlarındaki şüphe biraz azalmış gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir kriz için bir protokol olduğunu pek sanmam, ama… {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Sözlerinizde{/d} Lex Imperialis'in sesini duyuyorum." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor, ama bakışlarındaki şüphe biraz azalmış gibi duruyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Je doute qu'il existe un protocole pour une telle situation de crise, mais... J'entends la voix de la Lex Imperialis dans {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}vos propos{/d}. » {n}Elle fronce les sourcils, mais elle semble moins suspicieuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I doubt there exists a protocol for a crisis like this, but... I hear the voice of the Lex Imperialis in {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your words{/d}." {n}She frowns, but the suspicion in her gaze has somewhat eased.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je doute qu'il existe un protocole pour une telle situation de crise, mais... J'entends la voix de la Lex Imperialis dans {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}vos propos{/d}. » {n}Elle fronce les sourcils, mais elle semble moins suspicieuse.{/n}
